name: Mouse Chase (DerWaldFried)
description:
The task of the GameJam at which this game was created. Was to design a game that can be played only with the computer mouse, limited to left mouse, right mouse and middle mouse. The result is this demo. The small server chase your computer mouse. Bring the small server safely to the finish.

Feedback is clearly encouraged. But please make sure to be fair. Game is created with Unity3D. GameJam joined to learn more Skill in first way´s of Game Programming.
